alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 12:57AM EST until January 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and patchy freezing drizzle. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to a light glaze expected, with the highest totals across the northern half of Ford, Iroquois, Newton, and Jasper counties. * WHERE...In Indiana, Newton and Jasper Counties. In Illinois, Ford and Iroquois Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation for a period this afternoon will be in the form of rain and snow. Some light freezing drizzle is possible late this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
